@graph.rdfs:comment: A set of organisms asserted to represent a natural cohesive biological unit.
@graph.rdfs:label: Taxon

childTaxon.description: Closest child taxa of the taxon in question. Inverse property: parentTaxon

hasDefinedTerm.description: A Defined Term contained in this term set.

parentTaxon.description: Closest parent taxon of the taxon in question. Inverse property: childTaxon

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of this taxon given preferably as a URI from a controlled vocabulary – (typically the ranks from TDWG TaxonRank ontology or equivalent Wikidata URIs).

@graph.rdfs:comment: Closest child taxa of the taxon in question. Inverse property: parentTaxon
@graph.rdfs:label: childTaxon

@graph.rdfs:comment: A Defined Term contained in this term set.
@graph.rdfs:label: hasDefinedTerm

@graph.rdfs:comment: Closest parent taxon of the taxon in question. Inverse property: childTaxon
@graph.rdfs:label: parentTaxon

@graph.rdfs:comment: The taxonomic rank of this taxon given preferably as a URI from a controlled vocabulary – (typically the ranks from TDWG TaxonRank ontology or equivalent Wikidata URIs).
@graph.rdfs:label: taxonRank

@graph.rdfs:comment: Any biological, chemical, or biochemical thing. For example: a protein; a gene; a chemical; a synthetic chemical.
@graph.rdfs:label: BioChemEntity

associatedDisease.description: Disease associated to this BioChemEntity. Such a disease can be a MedicalCondition or a URL. If you want to add an evidence supporting the association, please use PropertyValue.

bioChemInteraction.description: A BioChemEntity that is know to interact with this item.

bioChemSimilarity.description: A similar molecular entity, e.g., obtained by fingerprint similarity algorithm.

biogicalRole.description: A role played by the molecular entity within a biological context.

hasBioChemEntityPart.description: Indicates a BioChemEntity that (in some sense) has this BioChemEntity as a part. Inverse property: isPartOfBioChemEntity

hasMolecularFunction.description: Molecular function performed by this BioChemEntity; please use PropertyValue if you want to include any evidence.

hasRepresentation.description: A common representation such as a protein sequence or chemical structure for this entity. For images use schema.org/image.

isEncodedByBioChemEntity.description: Another BioChemEntity encoding this one. Inverse property: encodesBioChemEntity.

isInvolvedInBiologicalProcess.description: Biological process this BioChemEntity is involved in; please use PropertyValue if you want to include any evidence.

isLocatedInSubcellularLocation.description: Subcellular location where this BioChemEntity is located; please use PropertyValue if you want to include any evidence.

isPartOfBioChemEntity.description: Indicates a BioChemEntity that is (in some sense) a part of this BioChemEntity. Inverse property: hasBioChemEntityPart

taxonomicRange.description: The taxonomic grouping of the organism that expresses, encodes, or in someway related to the BioChemEntity.

@graph.rdfs:comment: Disease associated to this BioChemEntity. Such a disease can be a MedicalCondition or a URL. If you want to add an evidence supporting the association, please use PropertyValue.
@graph.rdfs:label: associatedDisease

@graph.rdfs:comment: A BioChemEntity that is know to interact with this item.
@graph.rdfs:label: bioChemInteraction

@graph.rdfs:comment: A similar molecular entity, e.g., obtained by fingerprint similarity algorithm.
@graph.rdfs:label: bioChemSimilarity

@graph.rdfs:comment: A role played by the molecular entity within a biological context.
@graph.rdfs:label: biogicalRole

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates a BioChemEntity that (in some sense) has this BioChemEntity as a part. Inverse property: isPartOfBioChemEntity
@graph.rdfs:label: hasBioChemEntityPart

@graph.rdfs:comment: Molecular function performed by this BioChemEntity; please use PropertyValue if you want to include any evidence.
@graph.rdfs:label: hasMolecularFunction

@graph.rdfs:comment: A common representation such as a protein sequence or chemical structure for this entity. For images use schema.org/image.
@graph.rdfs:label: hasRepresentation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Another BioChemEntity encoding this one. Inverse property: encodesBioChemEntity.
@graph.rdfs:label: isEncodedByBioChemEntity

@graph.rdfs:comment: Biological process this BioChemEntity is involved in; please use PropertyValue if you want to include any evidence.
@graph.rdfs:label: isInvolvedInBiologicalProcess

@graph.rdfs:comment: Subcellular location where this BioChemEntity is located; please use PropertyValue if you want to include any evidence.
@graph.rdfs:label: isLocatedInSubcellularLocation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates a BioChemEntity that is (in some sense) a part of this BioChemEntity. Inverse property: hasBioChemEntityPart
@graph.rdfs:label: isPartOfBioChemEntity

@graph.rdfs:comment: The taxonomic grouping of the organism that expresses, encodes, or in someway related to the BioChemEntity.
@graph.rdfs:label: taxonomicRange
